problem_definition.command_line: rm -f vertical_integration.log; make clean-run; vertical_integration -b 0.0 -p 2 -t 1.0 -s 0.1 -v target src/integrated.vtu output > vertical_integration.log

variables.variable: import numpy import vtktools vtu = vtktools.vtu("output.vtu") result = vtu.GetScalarField("IntegrationField")

pass_tests.test: import fluidity_tools fluidity_tools.compare_variables(result, [1.0 for i in range(len(result))], 1.0e-9)
